value: Felu.io is a new way of teaching programming, assisted with AI generated images from Midjourney. Here you see a representation of a book, which a user will swipe through and uncover a deep and layered story underneath.

Initially there will be two stories, one following a character developing on a front end path, and another on a back end path. These stories will allow in-built programming windows to teach lessons, representing what the characters are learning in the story.
Humans learn better with story, lets teach them that way.
